metric.name: MEMTOTALFREE
metric.description: total free memory including swap space

metric.name: SSSWAPIN
metric.description: The average amount of memory swapped in from disk, calculated over the last minute

metric.name: SSSWAPOUT
metric.description: The average amount of memory swapped out to disk, calculated over the last minute

metric.name: SSRAWSWAPIN
metric.description: The number of blocks swapped in

metric.name: SSRAWSWAPOUT
metric.description: The number of blocks swapped out

metric.name: SSIOSENT
metric.description: The average amount of data written to disk or other block device, calculated over the last minute

metric.name: SSIORECEIVE
metric.description: The average amount of data read from disk or other block device, calculated over the last minute

metric.name: SSIORAWSENT
metric.description: The number of blocks sent to a block device

metric.name: SSIORAWRECEIVED
metric.description: The number of blocks received from a block device

metric.name: SSCPUUSER
metric.description: The percentage of cpu time spent processing user-level code, calculated over the last minute

metric.name: SSCPUSYSTEM
metric.description: The percentage of cpu time spent processing system-level code, calculated over the last minute

metric.name: SSCPUIDLE
metric.description: The percentage of cpu time spent idle, calculated over the last minute

metric.name: SSSYSCONTEXT
metric.description: The average rate of context switches, calculated over the last minute

metric.name: SSSYSINTERRUPTS
metric.description: The average rate of interrupts processed (including the clock), calculated over the last minute

metric.name: SSCPURAWUSER
metric.description: The number of ticks spent processing user code

metric.name: SSCPURAWSYSTEM
metric.description: The number of ticks spent processing system code

metric.name: SSCPURAWNICE
metric.description: The number of ticks spent processing reduced priority code

metric.name: SSCPURAWIDLE
metric.description: The number of ticks spent idle

metric.name: SSCPURAWWAIT
metric.description: The number of ticks spent waiting for IO

metric.name: SSCPURAWKERNEL
metric.description: The number of ticks spent processing kernel code

metric.name: SSCPURAWINTERRUPT
metric.description: The number of ticks spent processing hardware interrupts

metric.name: SSRAWCPUSOFTIRQ
metric.description: The number of ticks spent processing software interrupts

metric.name: DISKIONREADX
metric.description: number of bytes read from device since boot

metric.name: DISKIONWRITTENX
metric.description: number of bytes written to device since boot

metric.name: DISKIOREADS
metric.description: number of read access from the device since boot

metric.name: DISKIOWRITES
metric.description: number of write access to the device since boot

metric.name: DISKIOLA1
metric.description: The 1 minute average load of disk %

metric.name: DISKIOLA5
metric.description: The 5 minute average load of disk %

metric.name: DISKIOLA15
metric.description: The 15 minute average load of disk %

metric.name: IFINMULTICASTPKTS
metric.description: The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a higer (sub-)layer, which were addressed to a multicast address at this sub-layer. For a MAC layer protocol, this includes both Group and Functional addresses.

metric.name: IFINBROADCASTPKTS
metric.description: The number of packets, delivered by this sub-layer to a higher (sub-)layer, which were addressed to a broadcast address at this sub-layer.

metric.name: CPU
metric.description: The number of centi-seconds of the total system's CPU resources consumed by this proces
